common algorithms

and the radius of each xylem pipe.

hydroroot.radius.compute_length(g, length=0.0001)[source]

Set the length of each vertex of the MTG

hydroroot.radius.compute_relative_position(g)[source]

Compute the position of each segment relative to the axis bearing it. Add the properties “position” and “relative_position” to the MTG.

hydroroot.radius.compute_surface(g)[source]

Compute the total surface of the MTG (in square meters)

hydroroot.radius.compute_volume(g)[source]
Compute the total volume of the MTG (in cubic meters)

If there is a varying volume the equation is rather: .. math:

V =

rac{pi h}{3}(R_1^2+R_2^2+R_1 R_2)

hydroroot.radius.cont_radius(g, r_base, r_tip)[source]

Compute the radius of each segment of a root system.

Set radius for elements of a mtg with an increase rate computed from given base and tip radius in a continuous way.

hydroroot.radius.discont_radius(g, r_base, r_tip)[source]

Compute the radius of each segment of a root system.

Set radius for elements of a mtg with an increase rate computed from the length of the longest axis and its base and tip radius.

Radius can be discontinuous e.g. for a young/small lateral on an old root, the young root radius is very small initially compared to the old one.

hydroroot.radius.ordered_radius(g, ref_radius=0.0001, order_decrease_factor=0.5)[source]

Compute the radius of each segment of a root system.

Set radius for elements of a mtg with fixed decrease between each order.

ref_radius: reference radius of the primary root (in m) order_decrease_factor: radius decrease factor applied when increasing order

Download the source file ../../src/hydroroot/radius.py.
